data.name: CheckFlightsBegin
data.value: Check Flights

data.name: CheckFlightsCategoriesHeader
data.value: %APP_NAME% can examine your flights for issues in the following categories; you may wish to turn off those that are not relevant to you:

data.name: CheckFlightsDescription1
data.value: This will go through your flights and try to identify common issues. NONE OF THESE ISSUES RISE TO THE LEVEL OF ERROR, they may be perfectly valid, but they are things you may wish to check or clean up.

data.name: CheckFlightsNoIssuesFound
data.value: No issues were found!

data.name: CheckFlightsShortDescription
data.value: Review flights to find inconsistencies, potential data errors, or opportunities for best practices

data.name: errNoOptionsSelected
data.value: No options for checking flights have been selected. Please select at least one category.

data.name: LintCategoryAirports
data.value: Airports/route-of-flight issues

data.name: LintCategoryAirportsTip
data.value: Finds common issues around logging the route of flight, including invalid or missing airports.

data.name: LintCategoryCrossCountry
data.value: Cross-country issues

data.name: LintCategoryCrossCountryTip
data.value: Looks for common issues around logging of cross-country flights

data.name: LintCategoryDateTime
data.value: UTC Time issues

data.name: LintCategoryDateTimeTip
data.value: Ensures consistency for timestamps on flights, such as engine, flight, and block time

data.name: LintCategoryIFR
data.value: IFR Issues

data.name: LintCategoryIFRTip
data.value: Looks for common issues around logging instrument flight

data.name: LintCategoryMisc
data.value: Additional (uncategorized) issues

data.name: LintCategoryMiscTip
data.value: Checks for other common issues

data.name: LintCategoryPICSICDualMath
data.value: Time accounting issues (Leave UNCHECKED if flying under FAA rules)

data.name: LintCategoryPICSICDualMathTip
data.value: In much of the world (but NOT the US), Total=PIC+SIC+Dual. This checks for scenarios where this equation doesn't hold

data.name: LintCategorySim
data.value: Simulator/Training Device Issues

data.name: LintCategorySimTip
data.value: Looks for common issues and best practices regarding logging of time in a simulator.

data.name: LintCategoryTimes
data.value: Logged Time Issues

data.name: LintCategoryTimesTip
data.value: Ensures that time quantities within a flight make sense - e.g., that PIC time doesn't exceed total time.

data.name: PromptCopyLastCheckDate
data.value: Fill in the date of the last check

data.name: PromptLastCheckDate
data.value: Last check performed on {0:d}

data.name: PromptOnlyCheckNewFlights
data.value: Only check flights since:

data.name: SummaryFlightsFound
data.value: {0:#,##0} flight(s) checked; {1:#,##0} had issues.

data.name: TitleCheckFlights
data.value: Check Flights

data.name: TitleCheckThisFlight
data.value: Check this flight for possible issues

data.name: TitleCheckThisFlightShort
data.value: Check this flight

data.name: warningAirportAirplaneAtHeliport
data.value: Airplane landed at heliport: {0}

data.name: warningAirportLandPlaneAtSeaport
data.value: Land airplane landed at seaport: {0}

data.name: warningAirportLocal
data.value: Don't use "Local" or "LCL" for local flights around the pattern. Just one code is fine. (And LCL is an airport in Cuba).

data.name: warningAirportMissingNightLanding
data.value: Flight end at {0} at {1} appears to qualify as a night landing, but no night landings recorded
data.comment: {0} is airport, {1} is UTC formatted time

data.name: warningAirportMissingNightTakeoff
data.value: Flight start at {0} at {1} appears to qualify as a night takeoff, but no night takeoffs recorded
data.comment: {0} is airport, {1} is UTC formatted time

data.name: warningAirportNotFound
data.value: Airport in route not found: {0}

data.name: warningAirportUnlikelyImpliedSpeed
data.value: Route and total time imply a speed of {0:#,##0}kts. Errant airport code?

data.name: warningBlockAndTotalsDiffer
data.value: Block time and total time differ by {0}

data.name: warningBlockTimeDiffersDate
data.value: Block in or out differs from date of flight by more than a day

data.name: warningDateBlockAfterFlight
data.value: Block out time is after flight start

data.name: warningDateEngineAfterFlight
data.value: Engine start is after flight start

data.name: warningDateTimeInvalidBlock
data.value: Block out time is after block in time.

data.name: warningDualLoggedButNoCFIName
data.value: Flight indicates that instruction was received, but the instructor's name cannot be determined (flight is not signed and no "Instructor Name" property found)

data.name: warningDutyStartPriorToPreviousDutyEnd
data.value: New duty period started found that begins is prior to the end of an earlier duty period.

data.name: warningEngineEndBeforeBlockIn
data.value: Engine end time is before block in time

data.name: warningEngineStartAfterBlockIn
data.value: Engine start is after block in

data.name: warningEngineTimeDiffersDate
data.value: Engine start or end differs from date of flight by more than a day

data.name: warningFlightDutyStartPriorToPreviousFlightDutyEnd
data.value: New flight duty period started found that begins is prior to the end of an earlier flight duty period.

data.name: warningFlightEndAfterBlockIn
data.value: Flight end time is after block in time

data.name: warningFlightEndAfterEngineEnd
data.value: Flight end time is after engine end time

data.name: warningFlightEndBeforeBlockOut
data.value: Flight end time is before block out

data.name: warningFlightEndBeforeEngineStart
data.value: Flight end is before engine start

data.name: warningFlightHasNoData
data.value: Flight has a date and aircraft, but no other data.

data.name: warningFlightTimeDiffersDate
data.value: Flight start or end differs from date of flight by more than a day

data.name: warningHobbsAndTotalsDiffer
data.value: Hobbs time and total time differ by {0}

data.name: warningIFRApproachesButNoIFR
data.value: Instrument approaches or holding is indicated without IMC or simulated IMC

data.name: warningIFRNoApproachDescription
data.value: Approaches were performed but no "Approach Name(s)" property was found. Be sure that the approaches are documented either in the comments or in the "Approach Name(s)" property.

data.name: warningIFRNoSafetyPilot
data.value: Simulated instrument in a real aircraft is indicated, but no safety pilot is specified. Be sure to indicate the name of the safety pilot!

data.name: warningMiscDuplicateFlight
data.value: This flight appears to be identical to the previous flight; accidental duplicate?

data.name: warningMiscMultipleRedundantCheckrides
data.value: The property {0} is indicated on multiple flights, but should generally only ever happen once. E.g., you only ever take one Private Pilot Checkride, but later you might add new category/class privileges.

data.name: warningMoreDescribedLandingsThanTotal
data.value: Flight indicates a total of {0:#,##0} landings, but some described subsets of those landings exceeed {0:#,##0}!

data.name: warningNewDutyEndNoStart
data.value: Duty period end found with no corresponding start

data.name: warningNewDutyStart
data.value: Duty Period Start found while a prior one is still open (not matched with a corresponding Duty Period End)

data.name: warningNewFlightDutyEndNoStart
data.value: Flight duty period end found with no corresponding start

data.name: warningNewFlightDutyStart
data.value: Flight Duty Period Start found while a prior one is still open (not matched with a corresponding Flight Duty Period End)

data.name: warningPICSICDualBroken
data.value: Total time does not equal PIC + SIC + Dual time.

data.name: warningPreviousEngineEndsAfterStart
data.value: Engine Start is prior to previous flight's engine end

data.name: warningPreviousFlightBlockEndAfterStart
data.value: Block Out is prior to previous flight's Block In

data.name: warningPreviousFlightEndsAfterStart
data.value: Flight Start is prior to previous flight's flight end

data.name: warningPropertyGreaterThanTotal
data.value: Property "{0}" indicates more time than total time

data.name: warningSIMActualIMC
data.value: Actual IMC time logged in a sim - this should be recorded as simulated instrument.

data.name: warningSIMAircraftNotFound
data.value: Specified aircraft was not found!!

data.name: warningSIMCrossCountryInSim
data.value: Cross-country flight indicated in a sim - check that it's OK to log that!

data.name: warningSIMDeviceIdentifierOnRealAircraft
data.value: Flight found in a real aircraft, but a "Simulator/Training Device Identifier" property is specified.

data.name: warningSIMGroundSimInRealAircraft
data.value: Ground sim time is logged in a real aircraft

data.name: warningSIMNoDeviceIdentifier
data.value: Sim flight found with no "Simulator/Training Device Identifier" property to record the device's identifier. Ensure that this is recorded either in this property or in the comments.

data.name: warningSIMPICInSim
data.value: PIC time logged in a training device - check that this is OK to do!

data.name: warningSIMSICInSim
data.value: SIC time logged in a training device - check that this is OK to do!

data.name: warningSIMTotalInSim
data.value: Total time logged in a training device - check that this is OK to do!

data.name: warningTachEndBeforeTachStart
data.value: Tachometer end is less than tachometer start

data.name: warningTimesCFIGreaterThanTotal
data.value: More CFI time recorded than total time

data.name: warningTimesDualGreaterThanTotal
data.value: More dual time recorded than total time

data.name: warningTimesIMCGreaterThanTotal
data.value: More IMC time recorded than total time

data.name: warningTimesNightGreaterThanTotal
data.value: More night time recorded than total time

data.name: warningTimesPICGreaterThanTotal
data.value: More PIC time recorded than total time

data.name: warningTimesSICGreaterThanTotal
data.value: More SIC time recorded than total time

data.name: warningTimesSimIFRGreaterThanTotal
data.value: More simulated time recorded than total time

data.name: warningTimesSimPlusIMCGreaterThanTotal
data.value: More simulated and actual IMC time recorded than total time

data.name: warningTimesSuspectTime
data.value: Flight includes a time ({0}) that is...a bit in the future. Is it valid?

data.name: warningTimesXCGreaterThanTotal
data.value: More cross-country time recorded than total time.

data.name: warningXCDistanceLessThan25ButFlewMore
data.value: Flight indicates cross-country flight of less than 25nm, but route was longer than that from departure airport

data.name: warningXCDistanceLessThan50ButFlewMore
data.value: Flight indicates cross-country flight of less than 50nm, but route was longer than that from departure airport

data.name: warningXCDistanceMoreThan100ButFlewLess
data.value: Flight indicates cross-country flight of more than 100nm, but route from departure airport was less than that

data.name: warningXCDistanceMoreThan50ButFlewLess
data.value: Flight indicates cross-country flight of more than 50nm, but route from departure airport was less than that

data.name: warningXCInconsistentDistances
data.value: Flight includes properties indicating inconsistent or redundant distances of cross-country time for a flight.

data.name: warningXCMissingXC
data.value: Flight indicates travel of more than {0}nm from starting airport, but no cross-country time was logged. Shorting yourself?

data.name: warningXCNotWholeFlightXC
data.value: Some, but not all of the flight is listed as cross-country

data.name: warningXCTimeDistanceNotEqualXC
data.value: Flight includes a property indicating time with a particular distance of cross-country flight, but this doesn't match the total cross-country time logged on the flight.

data.name: warningXCTimeFoundButNoRole
data.value: Flight indicates cross-country time, but no PIC, SIC, Instructor/CFI, or Dual Received was indicated
